name: COVID19SARSCoV2SARSCoVInfluenzaVirusAAndBTests
title: COVID 19 (SARS CoV 2), SARS CoV, Influenza virus A and B Tests
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains laboratory observable panel codes for COVID-19 (SARS-CoV-2), SARS-CoV, and Influenza virus A and B Tests.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of blood, serum, or plasma for  COVID-19 (SARS-CoV-2), SARS-CoV, and Influenza virus A and B Tests.),(Inclusion Criteria: COVID-19 (SARS-CoV-2), SARS-CoV, and Influenza virus A and B lab tests using the source of blood, serum, or plasma, coded in LOINC, using panel codes. LOINC will need to be referenced for the individual laboratory observations associated with these panel code(s).),(Exclusion Criteria: Does not include any codes or concepts which do not represent COVID-19 (SARS-CoV-2), SARS-CoV, and Influenza virus A and B tests as defined in the inclusion criteria.)
